name: CatalystCombat
description:
Your application to work at Valem laboratories has been accepted. But once at the lab, things are a bit strange...

UPDATE: You can actually play the game now! (Also patched a glitch where you could not deal damage after the first wave)  

Tips: 

- Damage dealt to enemies via flasks is based on how dissimilar the color in the bottle is compared to the color of the enemy that is hit; Hit enemies with differently colored bottles to neutralize them.

- Hit enemies while they are airborne to increase knockback!

- Insert chips into dispensers to turn them on and change the color they dispense.
